title: Divine Polki & Emerald Collar Necklace - A Timeless Raasi Haaram
features: Exquisite collar necklace featuring a graduating line of Polki diamonds. Each diamond is meticulously set within a delicate halo of smaller brilliant-cut diamonds, enhancing its natural sparkle. The necklace is punctuated with vibrant, teardrop-shaped Emerald drops, adding a touch of regal elegance. Traditional 'Ghundi' style chain in the back for secure and comfortable fitting. Open setting to maximize the brilliance of the Polkies.
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi. Also suitable for modern formal events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Raasi Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The uncut Polki diamonds retain their natural character and charm, making each piece unique. The combination of Polki and Emerald is considered auspicious in South Indian traditions, signifying prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and rich luster. Durable and crafted to be an heirloom piece.
